title: It's Your Last Chance to Get an Extra 70% Off J.Crew's Big Summer Sale —These 28 Items Will Go First
description: Shop the chicest sale selects ahead.
excerpt: It's your last chance to shop J.Crew's Big Summer Sale. Score an extra 70% off the chicest sales finds. Shop everything from easy dresses to pretty accessories.
text: Calling all J.Crew fans! It’s your very last chance to score an extra 70% off sale items for J.Crew’s Big Summer Sale. As a fashion editor and a shopping connoisseur, I’m here to make sure you have no regrets when it comes to snagging the best of the best. I’ve hand-picked the best sale items and listed them out for you ahead. From easy yet chic dresses to gorgeous linens and beautiful accessories, there’s everything you could potentially want ahead.If you see anything you want, make sure to hit “add to cart” ASAP because these seriously great finds WILL NOT LAST. Don't forget to use the code EXTRA to see the prices below dramatically drop. J.Crew’s Big Summer Sale runs through July 7th. Keep scrolling to uncover your soon-to-be favorite wardrobe finds.Shop The Best J.Crew Big Summer Sale Items jcrew Wide-Leg Essential Pant in Linen jcrew Square-Toe Crochet Ballet Flats With the discount these will be under $100. jcrew Wide-Brim Raffia Bucket Hat Protect your scalp in style. jcrew Gwen Lace-Trim Slip Skirt in Textured Satin Lace-trim skirts have been trending so much over the last few weeks. J.Crew Cropped Button-Up Sweater Shell jcrew Krista Slingback Kitten-Heel Sandals in Leather I'm a sucker for a red shoe. J.Crew Drop-Waist Mixy Dress jcrew New Perfect-Fit Short-Sleeve T-Shirt I'm stocking up on these high-quality white tees. jcrew Airy Gauze Button-Up Shirt jcrew Claudia One-Piece in Classic Sculpt™ You can't go wrong with a black one-piece. jcrew New Gwyneth Skirt in Chiffon This semi sheer skirt will be less than $16 with the discount. jcrew Fine Rib Short-Sleeve T-Shirt Love this black tee. The other color ways are great too. jcrew Cabana Dress in Linen An easy linen dress for those breezy beach days. jcrew Broken-In Jersey Button-Front Tank Top With Ruffle Trim I'm obsessed with all the details. jcrew Heritage Cotton Fisherman Crewneck Sweater A summer sweater is a must. This knit will also be great year round. jcrew Classic Mariner Cloth Boatneck T-Shirt in Stripe Nautical stripes for the win. J.Crew Andi Ballet Flats in Mesh This is your sign to finally try some mesh flats. Especially because they're such a steal right now. jcrew Crinkled Gathered-Waist Skirt I'm all for a crinkle textured item. jcrew New Soleil Pant in Crinkled Viscose Blend Don't forget to snag these crinkled pants too. jcrew Ruched Cutout One-Piece in Brushed Daisy Print jcrew Slim-Wide Jean With Button-Fly There's no such thing as enough white dresses over summer. jcrew Pleated Tie-Waist Dress in Luster Georgette jcrew Tiered Slip Dress in Dobby Satin Dress this beauty up or down. jcrew Stretch Cotton-Blend V-Neck Top I'm so into the thicker straps on this tank. jcrew Ciel Top in Striped Cotton Poplin jcrew Braided Cage-Toe Sandals in Leather jcrew Airy Gauze Empire-Waist Midi Dress in Stripe Another gorgeous dress for the warm weather ahead. Why Trust Us? At Who What Wear, fashion is our speciality. Our editors have years of industry experience, from reporting on seasonal fashion trends seen at international fashion weeks to working with some of the most recognizable names in fashion. Every item we recommend is carefully selected based on current trends, quality, and real-world wearability.We regularly try pieces ourselves, including everything from best-selling jeans to designer shoes, speak to external experts and fashion insiders, and stay closely connected to what our readers are searching for. Our advice is grounded in expertise and has to pass our exceptional taste levels—so you can feel confident in every recommendation. Chinazor "Chichi" Offor is a Georgia-born, Los Angeles–based associate editor who relocated from Brooklyn, New York, and joined Who What Wear's West Coast office in 2022. At WWW, she utilizes over 10 years of editorial experience to dish out shopping advice to the masses and analyze key pop-cultural moments. Chichi previously worked at Refinery29, where she helped revolutionize the brand’s plus-size and inclusive fashion coverage. In her spare time, she’s keeping up with the latest movie releases, enjoying a relaxing day at the spa, or obsessing over her latest ADHD-fueled hyperfixation (e.g., Jesse McCartney's underrated career, the negative effects of bicoastal intellectual elitism, and Gen Z’s loneliness epidemic). You can find her online @thechichio on Instagram.
html:
Calling all J.Crew fans! It’s your very last chance to score an extra 70% off sale items for J.Crew’s Big Summer Sale. As a fashion editor and a shopping connoisseur, I’m here to make sure you have no regrets when it comes to snagging the best of the best. I’ve hand-picked the best sale items and listed them out for you ahead. From easy yet chic dresses to gorgeous linens and beautiful accessories, there’s everything you could potentially want ahead.

If you see anything you want, make sure to hit “add to cart” ASAP because these seriously great finds WILL NOT LAST. Don't forget to use the code EXTRA to see the prices below dramatically drop. J.Crew’s Big Summer Sale runs through July 7th. Keep scrolling to uncover your soon-to-be favorite wardrobe finds.

Shop The Best J.Crew Big Summer Sale Items

jcrew

Wide-Leg Essential Pant in Linen

jcrew

Square-Toe Crochet Ballet Flats

With the discount these will be under $100.

jcrew

Wide-Brim Raffia Bucket Hat

Protect your scalp in style.

jcrew

Lace-trim skirts have been trending so much over the last few weeks.

jcrew

An easy linen dress for those breezy beach days.

jcrew

I'm obsessed with all the details.

jcrew

A summer sweater is a must. This knit will also be great year round.

Nautical stripes for the win.

J.Crew

This is your sign to finally try some mesh flats. Especially because they're such a steal right now.

jcrew

I'm all for a crinkle textured item.

jcrew

Don't forget to snag these crinkled pants too.

jcrew

jcrew

I'm so into the thicker straps on this tank.

jcrew

Ciel Top in Striped Cotton Poplin

jcrew

Braided Cage-Toe Sandals in Leather

jcrew

Airy Gauze Empire-Waist Midi Dress in Stripe

Another gorgeous dress for the warm weather ahead.

Why Trust Us?

At Who What Wear, fashion is our speciality. Our editors have years of industry experience, from reporting on seasonal fashion trends seen at international fashion weeks to working with some of the most recognizable names in fashion. Every item we recommend is carefully selected based on current trends, quality, and real-world wearability.

We regularly try pieces ourselves, including everything from best-selling jeans to designer shoes, speak to external experts and fashion insiders, and stay closely connected to what our readers are searching for. Our advice is grounded in expertise and has to pass our exceptional taste levels—so you can feel confident in every recommendation.

Chinazor "Chichi" Offor is a Georgia-born, Los Angeles–based associate editor who relocated from Brooklyn, New York, and joined Who What Wear's West Coast office in 2022. At WWW, she utilizes over 10 years of editorial experience to dish out shopping advice to the masses and analyze key pop-cultural moments. Chichi previously worked at Refinery29, where she helped revolutionize the brand’s plus-size and inclusive fashion coverage. In her spare time, she’s keeping up with the latest movie releases, enjoying a relaxing day at the spa, or obsessing over her latest ADHD-fueled hyperfixation (e.g., Jesse McCartney's underrated career, the negative effects of bicoastal intellectual elitism, and Gen Z’s loneliness epidemic). You can find her online @thechichio on Instagram.
